events.message: I received the laptop yesterday but the screen has a large scratch and some pixels seem broken. This is unacceptable for a new product.
The issue reported involves a damaged screen and defective pixels indicating a product defect.
Your case has been assigned to a customer support specialist who will assist you further with your laptop issue.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the problem with your laptop screen. I’m here to help you get this resolved as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the broken pixels so we can assess the damage better?
I have attached several photos showing the large scratch clearly and the faulty pixels on the top right corner of the screen.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you either a replacement laptop or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I appreciate the quick response. I would prefer a replacement laptop, please, since I still want the same model but in perfect condition.
We have processed the replacement order for your laptop. You will receive a shipping confirmation within 2 days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the replacement laptop and that it is in perfect condition as expected.
Yes, I received the new laptop yesterday and it arrived without any defects. Thank you for the excellent support.
We’re glad everything has been resolved to your satisfaction. Closing your case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
